modShortDescription: Double the potency of the vanilla first aid bandage with a twist. The twist being your leg. Left click for heals, right click for cast.
modDescription:
Double the potency of the vanilla first aid [bandage](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-medical-supplies/) with a twist. The twist being your leg. Left click for heals, right click for cast.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/theredwolf13/theredwolf13_Modlets/tree/master/theredwolf13_First%20Aid%20Bandage%20Splint)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/18991-theredwolf13s-modlets/).

**Credits:** [theredwolf13](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/theredwolf13/)
